scripts.add-page: func() { mkdir ./src/pages/${1:-somepage}; npm run add-file-html ${1:-somepage};}; func
scripts.add-file-html:
func() { touch ./src/pages/${1:-somepage}/${1:-somefile}.html; echo '

Your new '${1:-somefile}' Page

' >> ./src/pages/${1:-somepage}/${1:-somefile}.html; npm run add-file-sass ${1:-somepage};}; func
scripts.add-file-sass: func() { touch ./src/pages/${1:-somepage}/${1:-somefile}.scss; echo 'h1 > span {color: red}' >> ./src/pages/${1:-somepage}/${1:-somefile}.scss; npm run add-file-js ${1:-somepage};}; func
scripts.add-file-js: func() { touch ./src/pages/${1:-somepage}/${1:-somepage}.js; echo '<script src="./'${1:-somepage}.js'"></script>' >> ./src/pages/${1:-somepage}/${1:-somepage}.html; echo '@import "../pages/'${1:-somepage}'/'${1:-somefile}.scss'";' >> ./src/styles/imports.scss; npm run add-to-homepage ${1:-somepage};}; func
scripts.remove-page: func() { rm -rf ./src/pages/${1:-somepage}; npm run clear-files ${1:-somepage};}; func
